analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhamma

original: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya
analyzed: paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ
na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe satta

original: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe…
analyzed: na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca saṅkhitta hetuyā catuvīsa pe
